aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: This model depicts a material as seen by the recycler at the end of the lifecycle of a product. If a material consists of only one single component the name and class for the aspect are not used

IEC61360:definition.IEC61360:langString: This model depicts a material as seen by the recycler at the end of the lifecycle of a product. If a material consists of only one single component the name and class for the aspect are not used
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

Class according to the refernced standard the material belongs to. The IMDS recommendations and the IMDS rules are exclusevily accessible within the IMDS portal to members of the IMDS association. In order to access the data one needs to be member of the association.
Percentage of already recycled material contained.
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

Class according to the refernced standard the material belongs to. The IMDS recommendations and the IMDS rules are exclusevily accessible within the IMDS portal to members of the IMDS association. In order to access the data one needs to be member of the association.
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Describes a Property containing a reference to one of the units in the Unit Catalog.
Quantifiable value as double in reference to the measurementUnit
quantity characteristic for the material expressed in value and unit
Percentage of already recycled material contained.

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: This model depicts a material as seen by the recycler at the end of the lifecycle of a product. If a material consists of only one single component the name and class for the aspect are not used
The commercial name of a material
The class of a material following the referenced standard.
Components the material consists of
The properties that describe a component
The aggregate state the materialis in at the timepoint the item is disassembled
Indicates if the material was is recycled. Percentage of how much of the material was recycled. This can be an aggregation regarding the materials below.
A short abbreviation of the materialName
The class of a material following the referenced standard.
The commercial name of a material
Quantity of the material
Unit of Measurement for the quantity of serialized objects. The recommended units are the SI units such as unit:kilogram or additional unit:percent
Measurement value as a double. The unit is saved in the property measurementUnit
The properties that describe a component
The aggregate state the materialis in at the timepoint the item is disassembled
Indicates if the material was is recycled. Percentage of how much of the material was recycled. This can be an aggregation regarding the materials below.

The class of a material following the referenced standard.
The commercial name of a material
Quantity of the material

Measurement value as a double. The unit is saved in the property measurementUnit
Indicates if the material was is recycled. Percentage of how much of the material was recycled. This can be an aggregation regarding the materials below.
